import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import TaskList from'./components/TaskList';import TaskInput from'./components/TaskInput';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api/tasks';// Fetch all tasks
useEffect(()=>{fetchTasks();},[]);const fetchTasks=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);setError(null);const response=await axios.get(API_URL);setTasks(response.data);}catch(err){setError('Failed to fetch tasks');console.error('Error fetching tasks:',err);}finally{setLoading(false);}};// Add a new task
const addTask=async title=>{if(!title.trim()){setError('Task title cannot be empty');return;}try{setError(null);const response=await axios.post(API_URL,{title});setTasks([response.data,...tasks]);}catch(err){setError('Failed to add task');console.error('Error adding task:',err);}};// Delete a task
const deleteTask=async id=>{try{setError(null);await axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id));setTasks(tasks.filter(task=>task._id!==id));}catch(err){setError('Failed to delete task');console.error('Error deleting task:',err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83D\uDCDD Task Manager"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskInput,{onAddTask:addTask}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading tasks..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskList,{tasks:tasks,onDeleteTask:deleteTask})]});}export default App;
